/*!

 * All rights reserved. See LICENSE in the project root for license information.
 */import{msdyn365Commerce}from'../index';/**
 * Commerce Input action
 */export class CommerceEntityInput{constructor(options){this.getApiUrl=url=>{return"".concat(msdyn365Commerce.apiSettings.baseUrl).concat(url);};this.getCacheObjectType=()=>this._cacheObjectType;this.getCacheKey=()=>this._cachekey;this.dataCacheType=()=>this._dataCacheType;/**
         * @deprecated shouldCacheOutput has ben deprecated in favor of dataCacheType
         */this.shouldCacheOutput=()=>this._dataCacheType==='request';this._cacheObjectType=options.cacheObjectType;this._cachekey=options.cacheKey;this._dataCacheType=options.dataCacheType||(options.shouldCacheOutput?'request':'none');}}
